titleStmt.title: A short account, or state of Mr. Sheridan's case before the late House of Commons in a letter to J.T.
titleStmt.author: L. T.
J. T.
Sheridan, Thomas, 1646-ca. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Hindmarsh at the Bull in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: "The speech of Mr. Tho. Sheridan, after his examination before the late House of Commons, on Wednesday the 15th. of December, 1680", B1v-C3r.
Reproduction of the original at the Harvard University Library.
